channel.title: Imp of the Perverse (4 sessions, July)
channel.description:
*Imp of the Perverse* _Wednesdays, July 2019, 7:30 PM PST_ Here are four sessions of Imp of the Perverse, a psychological horror game of monster hunting in Jacksonian Gothic America. In this darker version of the 1830s and 1840s, you play a member of society with an Imp of the Perverse on your shoulder, constantly impelling you to do terrible deeds. Only by hunting down those who have given in to their Imps, and turned into monsters themselves, can you rid yourself of yours.
S1 (July 3) https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhLkli1GQIwUxO1vZqc S2 (July 10) https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhLlHXchE_RQWLJDQhb S3 (July 17) https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhLlIHvhjOhwjPYDZio S4 (July 24) https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhLlIw1hMptq3nM9VRl
